blogs.title: New Year's Reflections 2025
blogs.content:
Okay so I pretty much have to think about my New Year's resolutions right now. So I think this was a pretty good year, it was pretty solid. I didn't really think there's a lot to be proud of this year.

At the beginning of it, I did a lot of working and a lot of building. Here's what I learned:

## Key Takeaways

- **Consistency beats intensity** - Showing up every day matters more than occasional bursts of effort
- **Build in public** - Sharing progress keeps you accountable and connects you with others
- **Focus on fundamentals** - The basics never go out of style

## Looking Forward

For 2025, I want to focus on:

1. Writing more consistently
2. Finishing projects instead of starting new ones
3. Reading more books

Let's see how it goes.
